overview:
Julia, who joined 3i in January 2006, is Group Finance Director Designate and will formally become Group Finance Director with effect from 30 November 2008. Julia was appointed to the board of 3i Group plc on 1 October. She is a member of the Groupâ€™s Risk Management Committee, Operational Risk Committee and Financial Risk Committee.

Julia began her career at Arthur Andersen in their London Tax Practice before moving on to senior tax roles with Hanson plc and Tomkins plc. She subsequently moved on to become Group Tax Director at Cable & Wireless plc in 2000 where she held a number of finance roles, becoming Group Director of Corporate Finance with responsibility for the Finance, Treasury, Tax and Property functions.
